channel.title: Pages on Shenzhen Juku Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Shenzhen Juku Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd

item.title: History
item.description: May 18, 2018: Shenzhen Juku Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd was established October 2018: The first product wake-up light launched 2019: Amazon market share of wake-up lights is 30%, and products are expanded to smart alarm clocks, smart remote controls, smartphone accessories and other product lines 2020: Become a well-known product provider in the smart home automation area 2021: The 3rd wake-up lights launched, and the new ambient light series launched
